snippet: Even some Republican senators may see a need to keep guns out of the wrong hands.
abstract: Editorial urges Senate to approve compromise bill Sen Joe Manchin III is negotiating with Republicans, which may be most likely way to expand current background-check system; notes background-check bill, combined with prohibition on gun trafficking, may be best Congress can do in light of intense opposition of gun lobby to ban on assault weapons.
lead_paragraph: Even some Republican senators may see a need to keep guns out of the wrong hands.

headline.seo: The Public Wants Background Checks for Gun Sales
